      • readInt

        protected int readInt(String label,
                      int min,
                      int max)
        This method will only read in a range of Integer value with label
        Parameters:
        label - is the message to be printed when asking for input
        min - is the minimum range to be read in
        max - is the maximum range to be read in
        Returns:
        an Integer value between min and max

      • readChoice

        protected int readChoice(int min,
                         int max)
                  throws BaseMenu.ExitException
        This method will only read in a range of Integer value with back/exit function
        Parameters:
        min - is the minimum range to be read in
        max - is the maximum range to be read in
        Returns:
        an Integer value between min and (max-1)
        Throws:
        BaseMenu.ExitException - when the max value is selected

      • readChoice

        protected int readChoice(String label,
                         int min,
                         int max)
                  throws BaseMenu.ExitException
        This method will only read in a range of Integer value with customize label and back/exit function
        Parameters:
        label - is the message to be printed when asking for input
        min - is the minimum range to be read in
        max - is the maximum range to be read in
        Returns:
        an Integer value between min and (max-1)
        Throws:
        BaseMenu.ExitException - when the max value is selected

      • confirm

        protected boolean confirm(String message)
        Confirmation Message -------------------- This method only accept 'y' or 'n' as input return true if input is 'y' or return false if input is 'n' Otherwise it will repeatedly prompt user for input

        Returns:
        Date when a correct format if entered, Otherwise keep prompting
